entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
